body.p:
Head Quarters Mil Comder
Louisville May 16th 1864
Maj Genl D W Lindsay
Inspt Genl Ky

Allow me to introduce Maj Jos H Wheeler formerly of the 1st Ky Inft and a most excellent and efficient officer. He can secure a large battalion of men from the old 1st & 2d Ky, Listen to him, he will tell you the truth and can do what he states

Truly Yours &c
S D Bruce
Col 20th Ky Inft
Mil Comder

Maj. Genl. S. G. Burbridge
Lexington Ky

Head Quarters Ky S. G.
Insp Genl Office
May 17th 1864
Respy forwarded to the Adjt Genl. I concur with Col Bruce in recommending Maj Wheeler and hope every facility will be afforded him in raising a Regt under the Six months call

D W Lindsey
Insp Genl Ky

Head quarters Dis of Ky.
Lex. Aug. 25 1864
Respectfully referred to Gov. Tho. E. Bramlette with the for his information.

S G Burtridge
Brev. Maj, Gen.
If Maj Wheeler presents a Regt organized within the time for raising 6 months troops he will be Comsd Col & the other offices filled as recommended by him May 17th 1864
